translation.en: you still managed to escape the final room.
Did you ever think you had that in you?
translation.ko: 네게 그럴 능력이 있다고 생각해본 적 있나?

translation.en: That adrenaline, that drive?
Sit down. Celebrate.
You won something for once.
So, you're the psycho that designed this murder maze, huh?
translation.ko: 이 살인 미로를 설계한 사이코 양반이신가?

translation.en: No, I'm the Games Master.
The Puzzle Maker designs the rooms.
But you kill people for fun. There's nothing good left on TV?
translation.ko: 근데 당신은 재미로 사람을 죽이잖아 이젠 TV에서 재밌는 걸 안 하나?

translation.en: You killed all your friends...
because you didn't want to pay for a goddamn cab.
I wouldn't get too comfortable on that high horse, Ben.
translation.ko: 나라면 그렇게 콧대 세우진 않겠어, 벤

translation.en: From the beginning of civilization...
we've known there was something captivating...
translation.ko: 인류는 목숨 걸고 싸우는 사람들을 지켜보는 데서

translation.en: about watching human beings fight for their lives.
translation.ko: 인류는 목숨 걸고 싸우는 사람들을 지켜보는 데서 황홀함을 느꼈지

translation.en: That's why we watch gladiator games, public executions...
translation.ko: 그래서 우린 검투사 경기와 공개 처형과

translation.en: rubber-necking on the freeway.
But now the world's gone soft.
Everything is safe. Everything is careful.
translation.ko: 늘 안전한 것만 따지고 무슨 일이든 조심스럽지

translation.en: So, we created a sport for people
translation.ko: 그래서 우린 스포츠를 만들었어 여전히 야만성에 목마른 이들을 위해서

translation.en: who still have a thirst for savagery...
and we provided them with a box seat
translation.ko: 그리고 우린 그들에게 궁극의 삶의 드라마를 엿볼 박스석을 제공했지

translation.en: for life's ultimate drama.
translation.ko: 궁극의 삶의 드라마를 엿볼 박스석을 제공했지

translation.en: Our customers are some of the most powerful
translation.ko: 우리 고객들은 세계에서 가장 영향력 있는 사람들이야

translation.en: people in the world.
translation.ko: 우리 고객들은 세계에서 가장 영향력 있는 사람들이야 근데 매년 고객들은 더 많은 걸 요구해

translation.en: But every year, they demand more.
translation.ko: 근데 매년 고객들은 더 많은 걸 요구해

translation.en: More complicated rooms.
More interesting subjects.
More ways to gamble on life and death.
translation.ko: 생사를 걸고 도박할 더욱 다양한 방법을

translation.en: Last year, they had college athletes...
the year before, savants...
and this year we had lone survivors.
They wanted to know if luck had anything to do with it.
translation.ko: 고객들은 그게 운 덕분인지 확인하고자 했지

translation.en: Lucky people don't get kidnapped and tortured by psychopaths.
You know, it's kind of hurtful when you call someone a psychopath, huh?
translation.ko: 사이코패스 소리를 들으면 나라고 상처 안 받을까 봐?

translation.en: I thought it was stupid, too.
But here you are...
our lowest-odds ever to win...
translation.ko: 역사상 우승 확률이 가장 낮았던 참가자가

translation.en: still alive.
I really didn't think it was possible...
but as I said... you were the long shot.
[STAMMERING] So I won.
That means I get to go home, right?
Ben...
at the end of the Kentucky Derby...
do you think the horse gets a prize?
Hey. Hey, Ben.
Come on. Hey, Ben, come on. Come on.
translation.ko: 벤, 정신 차려요 벤 빨리 일어나요

translation.en: Ben.
Ben.
Ben, come on, get up. Ben, come on, get up.
You can't leave until we finish our game, Zoey.
translation.ko: 게임이 끝나기 전엔 못 나가, 조이

translation.en: Okay, we have to make sure that--
He's dead.
Okay. Come on. Come on.
Come on, there's a service elevator.
You came back for me.
Yeah, well, I'm tired of being the only survivor.
BEN: Zoey, go, go. ZOEY: Okay.
NURSE: It's been 24 hours. He's stable now.
You should get some rest.
MAN [ON PA]: Dr. Bell, please come to the OR.
Dr. Bell, OR, please.
Miss Davis?
Are you feeling well enough to come with me?
Yeah, you're right, we'll have to check that for roof access.
OFFICER: All right, everyone, 360.
translation.ko: - 인원 배치하겠습니다 - 현장 확인하자고 좋아, 다들 사방을 살펴봐

translation.en: DETECTIVE: Miss Davis.
Wait, this was the waiting room. Okay?
And then it turned into a giant oven, okay?
And there was fire. The fire came down from the ceiling.
translation.ko: 그러다 불이 났는데 천장에서 불꽃이 내려왔죠

translation.en: We haven't found any evidence of the things you've described.
translation.ko: 데이비스 씨가 말씀하신 건 증거를 전혀 못 찾았습니다

translation.en: That. Look. This was the duct.
There was a painting that came down.
Have you ever seen things that weren't there before?
I am not imagining this, okay?
Look, Ben was there, too.
He'll tell you all this when he wakes up.
DETECTIVE: Right. Your friend, Ben Miller?
We got a report from the hospital.
They found traces of three different illegal substances in his bloodstream.
translation.ko: 세 가지 불법 약물의 흔적이 혈류에서 발견됐답니다

translation.en: "No way out."
DETECTIVE: Miss Davis. It's an anagram.
AMANDA: Dr. Wootan Yu.
MAN [ON TV]: Do you have the heart to let Dr. Wootan Yu help you--
translation.ko: 더 나은 자신이 되도록 우탠 유 박사의 도움을...

translation.en: No way out. Wootan Yu.
"Wootan Yu" is "No way out." DETECTIVE: Miss Davis.
No way out, Wootan Yu.
This. Look. That was a part of the game.
translation.ko: 여기요, 이걸 봐요! 저것도 게임의 일부였어요!

translation.en: This is part of the game!
We've got to vacate the premises.
Wootan Yu. Wootan Yu.
Thank you.
So, are you going to tell me what's going on?
I am the new regional sales rep for all of Logan Square.
translation.ko: 제가 로건 스퀘어 전역의 새 판매 담당자랍니다

translation.en: I'm officially client facing. It's for vegan dog food...
translation.ko: 공식적으로 고객을 응대하게 됐죠 채식 강아지 사료를 팔지만 시작이 반이니까요

translation.en: but, you know, you've got to start somewhere.
translation.ko: 채식 강아지 사료를 팔지만 시작이 반이니까요

translation.en: I'm really proud of you.
Is that homework?
What is this?
Mike Nolan died of a heart attack
in a bathroom in Union Station.
Jason Walker was thrown from his bike on the I-64...
translation.ko: 제이슨 워커는 64번 주간 고속도로에서 오토바이 사고가 났는데

translation.en: DMT found in his system.
Danny Khan drowns in Lake Michigan.
Amanda Harper, rock-climbing alone,
translation.ko: 어맨다 하퍼는 혼자 암벽 등반을 했대요

translation.en: because that makes sense...
translation.ko: 어맨다 하퍼는 혼자 암벽 등반을 했대요 딱 맞아떨어지잖아요

translation.en: falls and dies.
There would have been articles for us, too.
You've got to let this shit go.
I can't just pretend that they never existed.
Everyone else who was sent those invitations died...
translation.ko: 초대장을 받은 사람은 우리 빼고 다 죽었는데

translation.en: and whoever sent them is still out there.
translation.ko: 그걸 보낸 인간은 아직 살아 있잖아요

translation.en: Don't you want answers? We can find them.
translation.ko: - 답을 얻고 싶지 않아요? - 조이, 우린... 놈들을 찾을 수 있어요

translation.en: They rigged the game so that we would lose and we won.
translation.ko: 우리가 지게끔 조작한 게임에서 우린 승리했어요

translation.en: We beat them at their own game.
I didn't have a lot to go on, but...
the logo...
it's an impossible object.
It's an Escher staircase that turns in on itself.
It's totally unique.
The numbers are in a pattern on the staircase.
translation.ko: 계단에는 패턴에 따라 숫자가 적혀 있고요

translation.en: 23, 22 in a repeated sequence of right angles.
They're coordinates...
for an unlisted industrial building in the middle of Manhattan.
translation.ko: 맨해튼 한복판에 있는 미등록 영업용 건물인데

translation.en: They're hiding in plain sight.
What are we supposed to do with that?
I bought us plane tickets. Plane tickets?
Two weeks, I'm going.
Zoey, it's called "survivor's guilt."
My therapist says that in order to live, you need to move on.
translation.ko: 제 상담사 말이 살려면 그걸 잊어야 한대요

translation.en: Moving on doesn't mean running.
And I'm done running. Are you in?
translation.ko: 전 이제 도망 안 쳐요 같이 할래요?

translation.en: All right.
Yeah, I'm in. Let's do it.
You're not Jason Bourne, though.
Okay? Mm-hmm.
Come on. It's got to be in here.
Found it! X marks the spot.
Come on, come on, where is it?
This has to be it, right? I've got the tool!
Right here. It must connect to the bolt we found.
translation.ko: 여기요, 우리가 찾은 볼트에 연결될 거예요!

translation.en: Okay.
Try it on the door. See if it'll turn.
You can do it.
Anything? It's not going!
See if you can turn it. It's not working!
Try clockwise. Clockwise?
Yeah, clockwise! Okay.
Something happened here. What?
COMPUTER: Terrain, terrain. What's this?
No, it's another riddle.
"I fly without wings, I cry without eyes."
translation.ko: '나는 날개 없이 날고 눈 없이 운다'

translation.en: What does that mean? I don't know. Give me a second!
Heads down!
Brace for impact!
Wait, "cloud"! Try "cloud"! "Cloud"?
Yeah, "cloud." Okay.
Try the door! Come on, let's go!
COMPUTER: Pull up. Caution, terrain. Decision height.
Terrain, terrain. Pull up.
No, no! Come on! Come on!
translation.ko: - 결심고도, 지형 주의 - 안 돼 - 고도 상승 - 빨리요!

translation.en: COMPUTER: Caution, terrain. Terrain, terrain.
Do something!
translation.ko: - 지형 주의, 고도 상승 - 손을 써봐요!

translation.en: COMPUTER: Pull up. Decision height. Pull up.
Ending sim. Do you want to reset?
PUZZLE MAKER [DISTORTED VOICE]: No. Good work. We're ready for game time.
translation.ko: - 초기화할까요? - 아니 훌륭하다 게임을 시작할 준비가 됐군

translation.en: I hurt my goddamn hand on that bolt again, Larry.
translation.ko: 또 볼트 때문에 손을 다쳤잖아, 래리

translation.en: WOMAN [OVER SPEAKER]: Deboard the simulator.
[DISTORTED] What's the probability of survival?
It's approximately four percent.
PUZZLE MAKER: Well, it's not a game if she doesn't stand any chance.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 이길 가능성이 전혀 없다면 게임이 아니지

translation.en: We've intercepted her flight information. It's on.
translation.ko: 두 사람의 비행 정보를 해킹했다 게임 시작이다

translation.en: I'm so glad Zoey got over her fear of flying.
translation.ko: 조이가 비행 공포증을 극복해서 참 기쁘군

translation.en: Let's play again.
translation.ko: 게임을 다시 시작하지 게임을 다시 시작하지
